entry.title: Skyfall Sea Salt Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Sea Salt Scrub
Price: 27.99

Dirty Bee  |  Sea Salt Scrub 9oz

Skyfall: Blend of cedar and spice

Made with the best ingredients and Sea Salt to leave skin feeling refreshed, clean, and renewed. Use our amazing sea salt scrub to scrub away dead skin and to invigorate your luscious body!

Ingredients: Common Salt, Cottonseed Oil, Shea Butter, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth 20, Beeswax, Fragrance, Color, Vitamin E, Propylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Methylparaben, UV Inhibitor, Blue 1 Lake

Caution: Keep out of reach of children. For External use only. Keep out of eyes, ears, nose & mouth. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. 

Handmade in the USA
